targets.rawSql:
select
ts as time,
sum(cases)
from daily_global
group by ts
order by ts

select
ts as time,
sum(deaths)
from daily_global
group by ts
order by ts

select
sum(deaths) * 100.0 / sum(cases)
from daily_global

SELECT
  ts as time,
  sum(cases) as value,
  geoId
FROM
  daily_global
group by geoId,ts

select
  REPLACE(country,'_',' ') as Country,
  sum(cases) as Cases,
  sum(deaths) as Deaths,
  sum(deaths) * 100.0 / sum(cases) as "Mortality Rate"
from daily_global
group by country 
order by cases desc

select
1586004872 as time,
replace(country,'_',' '),
sum(cases) as cases
from (
	select
	ts,
	sum(cases) as cases,
	country
	from daily_global
	group by country,ts
	) as a
group by country
order by cases desc

select
1586004872 as time,
replace(country,'_',' '),
sum(deaths) as deaths
from (
	select
	ts,
	sum(deaths) as deaths,
	country
	from daily_global
	group by country,ts
	) as a
group by country
order by deaths desc

select
sum(${metric:csv}) as "New Daily ${metric:csv}",
ts as time
from daily_global
where $__unixEpochFilter(ts/1000)
group by ts
order by ts

with T1 as (
	select
		ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ts ASC) RowNumber,
		cast(dateadd(second,ts/1000,'19700101') as date) as Date,
		sum(${metric:csv}) as ${metric:csv}
	from covid_data.dbo.daily_global dg
	where $__unixEpochFilter(ts/1000)
	group by ts
),
T2 as (
	select
	RowNumber,
	date,
	avg(${metric:csv}) over (order by date asc rows 5 PRECEDING ) as MAVG
	from T1
)
select
	date as time,
	IIF(RowNumber > 4, MAVG, NULL) "Moving AVG 5"
from T2
order by date

with T1 as (
	select
		ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ts ASC) RowNumber,
		cast(dateadd(second,ts/1000,'19700101') as date) as Date,
		sum(${metric:csv}) as ${metric:csv}
	from covid_data.dbo.daily_global dg
	where $__unixEpochFilter(ts/1000)
	group by ts
),
T2 as (
	select
	RowNumber,
	date,
	avg(${metric:csv}) over (order by date asc rows 30 PRECEDING ) as MAVG
	from T1
)
select
	date as time,
	IIF(RowNumber > 29, MAVG, NULL) "Moving AVG 30"
from T2
order by date

select
sum(${metric:csv}) as "New Daily ${metric:csv}",
ts as time
from daily_global
where $__unixEpochFilter(ts/1000)
group by ts
order by ts

with T1 as (
	select
		ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ts ASC) RowNumber,
		cast(dateadd(second,ts/1000,'19700101') as date) as Date,
		sum(${metric:csv}) as ${metric:csv}
	from covid_data.dbo.daily_global dg
	where $__unixEpochFilter(ts/1000)
	group by ts
),
T2 as (
	select
	RowNumber,
	date,
	avg(${metric:csv}) over (order by date asc rows 5 PRECEDING ) as MAVG
	from T1
)
select
	date as time,
	IIF(RowNumber > 4, MAVG, NULL) "Moving AVG 5"
from T2
order by date

with T1 as (
	select
		ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ts ASC) RowNumber,
		cast(dateadd(second,ts/1000,'19700101') as date) as Date,
		sum(${metric:csv}) as ${metric:csv}
	from covid_data.dbo.daily_global dg
	where $__unixEpochFilter(ts/1000)
	group by ts
),
T2 as (
	select
	RowNumber,
	date,
	avg(${metric:csv}) over (order by date asc rows 30 PRECEDING ) as MAVG
	from T1
)
select
	date as time,
	IIF(RowNumber > 29, MAVG, NULL) "Moving AVG 30"
from T2
order by date

with t1 as
(
		select
			sum(${metric:csv}) as ${metric:csv},
			ts as time
		from daily_global
		where $__unixEpochFilter(ts/1000)
		group by ts
),
t2 as
(
	select time,
		${metric:csv},
		 LAG(${metric:csv},1) OVER (
		 	ORDER BY time 
		 ) ${metric:csv}Prev
	from t1
)
select
time,
${metric:csv}-COALESCE (${metric:csv}Prev,0) as "Daily Increase"
from t2
order by time

with t1 as
(
		select
			sum(${metric:csv}) as ${metric:csv},
			cast(dateadd(second,ts/1000,'19700101') as date) as time
		from daily_global
  where $__unixEpochFilter(ts/1000)
		group by ts
),
t2 as
(
	select time,
		${metric:csv},
		 LAG(${metric:csv},1) OVER (
		 	ORDER BY time 
		 ) ${metric:csv}Prev
	from t1
)
select
time,
case
	when 	${metric:csv}Prev is null then null
	when	${metric:csv}Prev = 0 then null
	else 	(${metric:csv}-${metric:csv}Prev)*100.0/${metric:csv}Prev
end "Percentage Change"
from t2
order by time

select
sum(${metric:csv}) as "New Daily ${metric:csv}",
ts as time
from daily_global
where $__unixEpochFilter(ts/1000)
and geoid = '$country'
group by ts
order by ts

with T1 as (

list.definition: SELECT replace(country,'_',' ') __text, geoid __value from daily_global order by country
list.label: Country
list.name: country
list.query: SELECT replace(country,'_',' ') __text, geoid __value from daily_global order by country
